Erdos0, Version 2020, August 7, 2020  
This is a list of the 512 coauthors of Paul Erdos. The date of first joint paper with Erdos is given, as well as the number of joint publications (if it is more than one).  An asterisk following the name indicates that this Erdos coauthor is known to be
data.text:
Erdos0, Version 2020, August 7, 2020

This is a list of the 512 coauthors of Paul Erdos. The date of first joint paper with Erdos is given, as well as the number of joint publications (if it is more than one). An asterisk following the name indicates that this Erdos coauthor is known to be deceased; additional information about the status of Erdos coauthors would be most welcomed. Numbers preceded by carets follow the convention used by Mathematical Reviews in MathSciNet to distinguish people with the same names. Please send corrections and comments to grossman@oakland.edu
